chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: In my distress I cried unto the LORD, and he heard me.
items.plainText: In my distress I cried unto the LORD, and he heard me.

items.text: Deliver my soul, O LORD, from lying lips, and from a deceitful tongue.
items.plainText: Deliver my soul, O LORD, from lying lips, and from a deceitful tongue.

items.text: What shall be given unto thee? or what shall be done unto thee, thou false tongue?
items.plainText: What shall be given unto thee? or what shall be done unto thee, thou false tongue?

items.text: Sharp arrows of the mighty, with coals of juniper.
items.plainText: Sharp arrows of the mighty, with coals of juniper.

items.text: Woe is me, that I sojourn in Mesech, that I dwell in the tents of Kedar!
items.plainText: Woe is me, that I sojourn in Mesech, that I dwell in the tents of Kedar!

items.text: My soul hath long dwelt with him that hateth peace.
items.plainText: My soul hath long dwelt with him that hateth peace.

items.text: I am for peace: but when I speak, they are for war.
items.plainText: I am for peace: but when I speak, they are for war.
